title: Forever Hope
description: Laura Shook has written a book that is unsparingly honest, deeply personal, and extraordinarily courageous. Beyond a book simply for those who may be in treatment or recovery from cancer, this is a timeless memoir of how one should live daily with hope, love, good humor, and faith in a compassionate God, and is destined to be an inspirational touchstone for years to come.
author: Laura Shook
